NewTrip.title: A departure close to you is available.
NewTrip.content: A departure close to you is available on Caroster [<%= event.name %>](<%= host %>/e/<%= event.uuid %>).

NewPassengerInYourTrip.title: A passenger has been added to your trip
NewPassengerInYourTrip.content: A passenger has been added to your trip. on Caroster [<%= event.name %>](<%= host %>/e/<%= event.uuid %>)

AddedAsAdmin.title: You have been added as admin to an event
AddedAsAdmin.content: You have been added as admin to Caroster [<%= event.name %>](<%= host %>/e/<%= event.uuid %>).
